Package paintingcanvas.painter.drawable

Class Rectangle

  • java.lang.Object
    • paintingcanvas.painter.drawable.Drawable<Rectangle>
      • paintingcanvas.painter.drawable.Rectangle
  • public class Rectangle
extends Drawable<Rectangle>
    A Rectangle element. 
    
 // Create a new Rectangle at (100, 100) with a width of 20 and a height of 30
 Rectangle rectangle = new Rectangle(100, 100, 20, 30);
